input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Project Management, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Role/Title: Account ExecutiveLocation: Nashville, TNSalary Range: $55-75kHybrid- 4 days in office, 1 day remote/week
Clutch Creative is a rapidly growing staffing agency. We support our clients by identifying unreachable talent that helps their businesses grow.
Our candidates work with us because they know we have the best opportunities available to them and will help them navigate their next career move.
We care, we're honest, and we hustle—that's what makes us Clutch.Clutch is looking for an Account Executive/Manager with agency experience for a client of ours.
Responsibilities:Supporting the Account Director on client projects so that they run smoothly and efficiently.Developing timelines and coordinating client approvals to preparing materials for client-facing meetingsManaging pre-production and post-production across a variety of campaignsManaging marketing campaigns from concept to executionCreating marketing plans for clientsPreparing creative briefs to effectivelyManaging the production cycle from start to finishBeing the brand manager: not only assuring all creative and products meet brand standards prior to going to client, but also keeping internal teams up to date on expectationsDeveloping strong relationships, to ensure that work is delivered efficiently and to the highest possible standardWorking collaboratively with outside vendors and internal employeesManaging day to day budgets and make sure all jobs are reconciled in a timely mannerEstimate/ invoice control and queries in liaison with Finance and ProductionHighly responsive with a proven ability to communicate at the executive levelStrong knowledge of digital campaign strategy and execution through both organic and paid tactics – social media, search, programmatic, YouTube, streaming audio.Familiarity with website development and video production processesAnalyze performance metrics and analytics and share reporting and ROI with internal team and clients
Required skills:4+ years of digital marketing and/or advertising experience with an understanding of business strategy, branding, go-to-market strategy, web design, and digital marketingAbility to effectively translate technical ideas to non-technical professionals and vice versaKnowledge of digital campaign strategy and execution through both organic and paid tactics – social media, search, programmatic, YouTube, streaming audio.Ability to work independently, but also a love of working with a creative teamBachelor’s degree in marketing, advertising, or related.Advanced degree a plus
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply today.Please read: Contact from Clutch employees will always come from the domain @clutchnow.com ONLY and we will always provide a phone number where you can contact us. Clutch will NEVER present a job offer without a verbal or video interview and we will never ask you to transfer or pay money to get hired. If you are skeptical about any email or job offer, please reach out to us directly.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Account Executive
output_json.summary: Clutch is seeking an Account Executive with agency experience for a client.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in marketing, advertising, or related
required_skills: 4+ years of digital marketing and/or advertising experience
understanding of business strategy, branding, go-to-market strategy, web design, and digital marketing
ability to effectively translate technical ideas to non-technical professionals and vice versa
knowledge of digital campaign strategy and execution through both organic and paid tactics
ability to work independently, but also a love of working with a creative team
soft_skills: strong knowledge of digital campaign strategy and execution
ability to communicate at the executive level
working collaboratively with outside vendors and internal employees
job_responsibilities: Supporting the Account Director on client projects
Developing timelines and coordinating client approvals
Preparing materials for client-facing meetings
Managing pre-production and post-production across campaigns
Managing marketing campaigns from concept to execution
Creating marketing plans for clients
Preparing creative briefs
Managing the production cycle
Being the brand manager
Ensuring all creative and products meet brand standards
Keeping internal teams up to date on expectations
Developing strong relationships
Ensuring efficient and high-standard work delivery
Managing day to day budgets
Reconciliation of jobs in a timely manner
Estimating/ invoicing control
Query management in liaison with Finance and Production
Highly responsive communication
Proven ability to communicate at the executive level
Familiarity with website development and video production processes
Analyzing performance metrics and sharing reporting and ROI
output_json.company_information: Clutch is a rapidly growing staffing agency supporting clients by identifying unreachable talent to help businesses grow.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Contact from Clutch employees will always come from the domain @clutchnow.com ONLY and we will always provide a phone number where you can contact us. Clutch will NEVER present a job offer without a verbal or video interview and we will never ask you to transfer or pay money to get hired.
